document.paragraph:
Did you know the default font was Arial? That's right - not Times New Roman, Roboto, Ubuntu, or Courier. Arial, also known as the "Mirrazz Docs Default Sans". Courier New is the "Default Monospace", and Times New Roman is the "Default Serif".
However, you can always set the font to Times New Roman.
However, you can always set the font to Courier New.
There are so many fonts that you can select, and we'll demo them all:
Arial, Times New Roman, Courier New, Courier, Arial Black, Impact, Mirrazz Sans-Serif, Mirrazz Serif, Mirrazz Console, Mirrazz Console Premium, Roboto, Helvetica, Permanent Marker, Comic Sans, Georgia, Pacifico, Lobster, Trebuchet MS
12pt, 14pt, 18pt, 22pt, 36pt, 48pt, 64pt, 72pt
